member.name: D2D1_DC_INITIALIZE_MODE
member.summary: Specifies how a device context is initialized for GDI rendering when it is retrieved from the render target.

member.name: D2D1_DC_INITIALIZE_MODE.D2D1_DC_INITIALIZE_MODE_COPY
member.summary: The current contents of the render target are copied to the device context when it is initialized.

member.name: D2D1_DC_INITIALIZE_MODE.D2D1_DC_INITIALIZE_MODE_CLEAR
member.summary: The device context is cleared to transparent black when it is initialized.
